channel.title: RSCE Map Editor
channel.description:
Rsce map editor has now been redone and working A LOT more better to create maps and etc...
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9hz0AZEfxVQ
Any suggestions?
Preview: [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2mgsj84.png[/img]

item.title: RSCE Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @Mini_RS Mini_RS
item.description:
@Mini_RS wrote:

@hm wtf lol xD ~

A few questions/idea’s, how ever you want to take it.

  1. i noticed that you didn’t include any cliff faces in the video, if you have 2 tiles next to each other, and max out their heights to be opposite(a = highest, b = lower) will it automatically create the cliff face between them?

  2. for tile and wall texture, are all current rsc textures loaded into your editor, or would it need to be custom loaded after we get the editor from you?

  3. i noticed that the section you are editing is a set amount of tiles, can you zoom in and out to the next section over, or just scroll around to the next section?

  4. when the first section is edited, will the next section you work on give you a cheat along the borders so you can line items up perfectly, i.e. water boundry’s, walls, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCE Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“Intoxication, post:25, topic:372701”][quote author=mapu link=topic=468740.msg3433448#msg3433448 date=1292550820]

You should eventually release an editor Mark. Haven’t seen one released for a long time.

cough leech

If I wanted one I would just ask Mark.[/quote]

As you have shown.

cough stillaleechbecauseyoucannotmakeyourown

Show me your map editor that you coded?

Where have I said that I needed one?

“stillaleechbecauseyoucannotmakeyourown”

In this case you’re labelling yourself a leech as you cannot code your own. It seems you just spam nonsense flame without thinking.

I never said I COULDN’T. I merely said I didn’t need one.

How many times are you going to embarrass yourself Mapu?[/quote]
You couldn’t if you tried.

Read full topic

You should eventually release an editor Mark. Haven’t seen one released for a long time.

cough leech[/quote]
If I wanted one I would just ask Mark. It’s just been a while since he’s released one but he’s made several very good one’s. Not really any harm to be done to release one as (from what I know) he hasn’t been doing too much with the one’s he codes.

cough wutwutindabutt

[/quote]Make yours a deal here is pictures of the landscape editor all tabs… Give me idea’s what to add what to change move around and etc if they are good suggestions in detail… Then I will give it to the people… Only the people who give me good detailed suggestions[/quote]
Sounds fair. Let’s hope people can help you out there! I would but I don’t need one

That is what this whole community is based on. Taking someones work and doing something with it.

item.title: RSCE Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Make the map editor have the ability to edit between sectors.

A Sector B Sector

I want to edit a part which includes all these sectors.

C Sector D Sector

I dont know if it already does that or not. Just a suggestion.
